title: Much more needs to be done to bridge last mile credit delivery: RBI dy governor Swaminathan J
description: Indian banks have made significant progress in reaching remote areas, but more needs to be done to improve last mile credit delivery, said RBI Deputy Governor Swaminathan J. He emphasized the need for better usage and quality of services to deepen financial inclusion, especially for MSMEs and women entrepreneurs.
